CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL($User.LanguageLocaleKey,"pt_BR"), "Informar as pessoas chaves e seus cargos/funções e principais responsabilidades para o desempenho do sistema de gestão de HSEQ.", "Inform key people and their positions/functions and main responsibilities for the performance of the HSEQ management system")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Attach the organization chart of the HSEQ department and the description of the team positions
CustomField.label: Occupation
